type.name: section
type.title: Certificate of competency.
type.context: BLASTING OPERATIONS ACT under Certificate of competency. 4. (1) The  Commissioner  of  Geological  Surveys  and  Mines (hereinafter referred to as the Commissioner) may grant a certificate of competency as a blaster to any person above the age of twenty years applying  therefor  who,  after  examination  by  such  person  as  the Commissioner may appoint in that behalf, appears   to   the Commissioner to be  practically conversant with the safe use and handling of explosives and the laying, tamping and firing of charges. Any person holding an examination shall report in writing the result thereof to the Commissioner.  (2) Where the holder of a certificate of competency by reason of any emergency is unable to perform his duties, the manager of such concession or other undertaking may, if authorised in writing by the Commissioner so to do, issue an emergency certificate of competency to any fit and proper person authorising such person to lay, tamp or fire charges for any blasting  operations on such mining concession or undertaking:  Provided that   no   emergency   certificate   issued   under   this subsection shall have effect when the emergency in respect of which it was issued has ceased to exist.  (3) Every person applying for the grant of a certificate of competency under subsection (1) shall pay into the office of the Commissioner an examination fee of six hundred and fifty dollars and any certificate of competency issued under subsection (1) or (2) shall be in the form set out in the Schedule, and shall be valid for such period not exceeding thirty days as may be stated therein. type.name: section
type.title: Cancellation or suspension of certificate.
type.context: BLASTING OPERATIONS ACT under Cancellation or suspension of certificate. 5.  The Commissioner may, in his discretion, cancel or suspend at any time any certificate of competency granted by him on any ground of incompetency or negligence on the part of the holder thereof.

type.title: Register of holders of certificates.
